price: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta bã zã su gushe ba sunã a cikin shakka daga gare shi, har Sa'a ta jẽ musu bisa ga abke, kõ kuwa azãbar wani yini bakarãre ta jẽ musu.
arabic: وَلَا يَزَالُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّنۡهُ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةً أَوۡ يَأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَقِيمٍ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yazālu alladhīna kafarū fī mir'yatin min'hu ḥattā tatiyahumu al-sāʿatu baghtatan aw yatiyahum ʿadhābu yawmin ʿaqīmin
